channel.title: Crowns not showing
channel.description: I made one of the kids on my server as a donor to test to see if the crown came up in oub chat. But they didn't Neither did it for admin, support, or mod. But it works for owner... And yes, I do have the sprites for it. What do I do?

item.title: Crowns not showing
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/348186-renamed-adding-custom-crowns-detailed-all-chat-types-rewritten-conventi.html

Use that tutorial and just add all of the ranks you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Crowns not showing
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

first you give away your sosa then you hardcode the sprites into the client

item.title: Crowns not showing
